channel.title: doubles on Stats On the T
channel.description: Recent content in doubles on Stats On the T

item.title: Player Ratings Tables Go Live!
item.description: A new section of the website is debuted: ‘Ratings’. Here (the hope) is to provide the top 100 singles and doubles men and women on tour each week using MOV Elo ratings.

item.title: Unicorns of the WTA
item.description: With the US Open hard court swing just around the corner, Ash Barty heads into the last leg of the season with the highest rating in women’s singles and doubles. Such simultaneous dominance in singles and doubles has, in the past decade, only been matched by Serena Williams.
